name: places/ChIJB5fZglhZwokRZmPHUaCc0zA
formattedAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Upscale bakery with Parisian origins, specializing in French macarons in a number of flavors.

originalText.text:
I rushed over to Hudson Yards and was pleasantly surprised by the shop center and so excited to get some macarons. The cart was difficult to find initially but I eventually got there, right before close. I was being gluttonous the week I was in town and did indeed eat everything within a day or so, delicious üòã

Wish I had also checked out the location with the cafe, next time for sure!

originalText.text:
First learned about Laduree from a trip to Paris. So happy to learn that there was one in NYC and had to make a visit. I was disappointed to learn it was a small cart stand at the Hudson Yards location but macaroons tasted fresh. They are truly unique in taste and the best macarons I‚Äôve tried. They are $$$ but the bonus is that you can get them beautifully wrapped if you‚Äôre into collecting or saving them.

Can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

originalText.text:
I remember last time I was here with my parents they were closed so I could not get some for them to try ! Now I have started to work at Hudson yards , most of the time I just pass by in a hurry. But the other day on my lunch time I just decided to give it a try , because I love macarons! Altho it's expensive but once in a while I try to treat myself with something I love.

Let me tell you I was amazed with the taste . I definitely can say their macaroons are one of the best I have ever had. And also figured that buying a pack is little more money then buying loose! So if you just wanna try for yourself, then you are better off that way. For a gift you definitely need the box !

I have already been here 3 times in a row lol. That's becoming my lunch , 3 macarons a day ..! So far my favorite is the coffee,, orange , chocolate & raspberry! Tell you the truth I am not a fan of raspberry but the tanginess just goes so well with macarons! I did try the pistachio but didn't like it much . But I did asked & they mentioned it's one of their best sellers! I love pistachios but this just didn't connect with me!

Love the d√©cor & customer service is always awesome! Such friendly & helpful stuff. Thank you guys for excellent customer service!

originalText.text: ‚ÄúOpens‚Äù at 10am. Nobody was there at 10 after. The cookies are brought in from another location in boxes. Had 5 flavors. No flavor signs out. Not really the service you‚Äôre expecting for expensive small cookies.

text.text: ‚ÄúOpens‚Äù at 10am. Nobody was there at 10 after. The cookies are brought in from another location in boxes. Had 5 flavors. No flavor signs out. Not really the service you‚Äôre expecting for expensive small cookies.

originalText.text: Says it opens at 10am, got there at 11ish and no one was still there. Got there at noon-ish and there was someone finally there and I stood there waiting for her to acknowledge me so I could get some macarons but she was too busy talking on her Bluetooth/phone that I ended up just leaving empty handed.  What a disappointment.
